disabled_explanation: Due to other options selected, you cannot change this field at this time
what_is_found:
Choose more suitable item in the list.
Then press Found to mark the item as found
what_is_unknown: If you have an item with unknown sizes press Unknown to mark the item as unknown
what_is_difference: If some size of the item differs from that indicated in the item by some amount, write the real size in this field
press_new_screen_create_chipboard_sheet_: Press New screen to create a Chipboard Sheet List
this_list_not_contains_any_chipboards: This list does not contain any chipboards
not_exceeding_target_quantity_explanatio: The quantity ({{enteredQty}}) cannot exceed what is written ({{targetQty}})

privacy_policy_title: Privacy Policy for the "Measure and Count" Android Application
privacy_policy_description: This Privacy Policy describes how the Android application "Measure and Count", available on Google Play, handles user data and privacy.
privacy_policy_text_1:
The "Measure and Count" app does not collect any personal information, location data, or server/HTTP logs from users.
The only permission required is Internet access, which is used to display Google mobile ads (AdMob) on the screen for entering new chipboards.
The app does not collect any persistent identifiers (e.g., Google Advertising ID, device ID).
privacy_policy_text_2:
The app stores the lists of chipboards that the user enters. This data is stored locally on the device and is only used to:
- Display the saved chipboards to the user
- Assist with measuring and verifying parts
The app does not transmit this data to any server or third party.
privacy_policy_text_3:
The app allows the user to manually share chipboard lists with other apps (e.g., via messaging or email) in plain text format.
No data is automatically shared by the app.
privacy_policy_text_4:
This app displays advertisements provided by Google AdMob. AdMob may collect and use certain data, including device identifiers, location data (if available), and interaction data, to show personalized or non-personalized ads.
For more details on how Google uses data, please refer to the Google Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy_text_5:
The "Measure and Count" app helps users measure and count chipboards, wood, and similar materials. Its functionality includes:
- Creating a list of chipboards with dimensions, grain directions, and colors
- Measuring received chipboards and matching them to the list
- Marking incorrect sizes, directions, or colors with optional notes
- Generating a summary of issues that can be shared with others
This app is designed solely for this purpose and does not perform any additional background tasks or collect extra data.
privacy_policy_where_to_email: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact the developer at simchenko-alexey@hotmail.com
